Edison Trails Park.knownFor: “ Not for Hiking ” Reviewed December 9, 2014 Edison Trail starts east of Edison Trails Park, which sits along South Garfield Avenue. It spans four blocks eastward and ends at Fulton Avenue, just before La Loma Park. This trail is not for hiking. This hike was basically walking through the backyards of neighboring homes.
